name: Long_Day%27s_Journey_Into_Night
text:
Long Day's Journey Into Night
Long Day's Journey Into Night was a play to be performed by the Twin Peaks Timber Players.
At the time of his death, Leland Palmer was to appear in the role of James Tyrone, Sr.
Behind the scenes
Long Day's Journey Into Night is a Pulitzer Prize-winning four-act drama written by Eugene O'Neill, first published in 1956.
